name: Norway
declaringWar: Now comes a storm you cannot escape. You can only hope for a quick death.
attacked: This will make a great saga! The skalds will sing of my valor!
defeated: So, I will join the einherjar in Valhalla and feast, while you toil away here.
introduction: Harald Sigurdsson stands before you: a Viking unlike any the seas and lands have ever known. Hah, are you afraid?
neutralHello: Friend? Yes, I am a friend.
hateHello: No, not for all the treasure in Asgard.
tradeRequest: I have sent you traders with gifts!
uniques: +[50]% Production when constructing [Water] units [in all cities]
Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark

name: Australia
declaringWar: After thorough deliberation, Australia finds itself at a crossroads. Prepare yourself, war is upon us.
attacked: We will mobilize every means of resistance to stop this transgression against our nation!
defeated: The principles for which we have fought will survive longer than any nation you could ever build.
introduction: John Curtin, I speak for the people of Australia as their Prime Minister. We seek sympathetic allies in the fight against the hawks of war.
tradeRequest: I've sent a trade delegation to your territories. I hope you will receive them with my sincerest thanks.
uniqueText: 5% of food is carried over after population increases in coastal cities. Monument, Market, Library, and Camp receive an additional +1 yield.
uniques: Gain a free [5]% of food is carred over after population increases [in every coastal city]

name: Canada
declaringWar: As an unstinting malignancy defines your relationship to Canada, we have no recourse than war.
attacked: As we can reach no peaceful resolution with you, Canada must turn, with reluctance, to war.
defeated: So ends our dream of a Canada that might have been. Our people are good-hearted. Rule with mercy,
introduction: On behalf of the people of Canada, welcome. I am Prime Minister Laurier.
hateHello: Negotiating with you tests the limits of human patience.
tradeRequest: The people of Canada present gifts!

name: The Cree
declaringWar: I do not care to inflict the terrors of war upon you—but justice requires it.
attacked: You could have found another way. Now, your regrets will be measured in blood.
defeated: Had I wanted war, I would not be here now. You did not catch me. I gave myself up.
introduction: I am Poundmaker, and I represent the Cree. May there always be peace between us.
tradeRequest: My people send you gifts. With these you will last through winter.

name: Ethiopia
declaringWar: Your actions insult the people of Ethiopia, and for that you must pay a heavy price.
attacked: Do you not know that the Lion of Judah has always conquered? Well, you will learn soon enough.
defeated: Do you think God abandoned Ethiopia? Do you think his favor rests on you? Do not gloat in your victory today.
introduction: I am Menelik, Lion of Judah, of the house and lineage of Solomon, emperor of Ethiopia. Greetings.
neutralHello: You are on the right side of history.
tradeRequest: Ethiopia sends you our warm wishes.
uniques: +[20]% Strength if within [2] tiles of a [Hill]

name: Gaul
declaringWar: I have bested many enemies in war before, and finally I shall match my strength against yours!
attacked: Peace is stifling. Only in war can we see who is the greater chief.
defeated: Such power! Perhaps I underestimated you before. Now, in defeat, I will give you the respect you are due.
introduction: All you see is the land of the Gauls, and I am Ambiorix, their chief.
hateHello: I understand. You must be careful.
tradeRequest: Come, let us feast!
uniques: Earn [20]% of [Barbarians] opponent's [Cost] as [Culture] for kills
+15% combat strength for melee units which have another military unit in an adjacent tile

name: Georgia
declaringWar: God fights with us. You stand alone.
attacked: Georgian hearts will not tremble before your multitudes.
defeated: Walls weren't enough to save Georgia from ruin. Neither was I.
introduction: I am Tamar of Georgia. Say what you will and be on your way.
tradeRequest: Georgian merchants bring many gifts.
uniqueText: +50% Production when constructing Walls in all cities, +1 Movement for all units during Golden Age, +10% Strength for all units during Golden Age
uniques: +[50]% Pr oduction when constructing [Walls] [in all cities]
+1 Movement for all units during Golden Age
+10% Strength for all units during Golden Age

name: Gran Colombia
declaringWar: Your tyranny, if unchecked, dooms the world to darkness, and for this reason I must declare war on you.
attacked: Recourse to war is regrettable, but necessary, when dealing with vipers like you.
defeated: Everything I have done, I did for the nation of Gran Colombia. I remain a patriot to the very end.
introduction: I, President Simon Bolivar, welcome you to Gran Colombia.
tradeRequest: I send to you a delegation of my finest horsemen. Will you let them in?

name: Indonesia
declaringWar: Before this war ends, you will know the fury of a thousand ships.
attacked: Truly? Didn't you know my vengeance puts monsoons to shame? Soon you will.
defeated: The dream of Nusantara is lost to the turning tide.
introduction: I am Gitarja, Indonesia's queen and protector. Those who thought us weak litter the ocean floor.
neutralHello: I knew you had it in you.
hateHello: You are like the muck that spreads around ships in calm waters.
tradeRequest: Our delegation brings oncom spore cakes!
uniqueText: +1 production from every coast,lake tile in the city, +1 gold from every market

name: The Khmer
declaringWar: I will not allow the Empire to suffer you any longer. The time has come to end this charade!
attacked: War, then? Fools think fortune is on their side. Who will you blame when yours runs out?
defeated: One gains humility in defeat. I pray you are granted the most humility of all.
introduction: I am Jayavarman VII, and the Khmer allow me to lead them. Their suffering is my suffering.
hateHello: You defy Heaven with your harsh words!
tradeRequest: Our delegation brings gits!

name: Kongo
declaringWar: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from God's path, and now we will correct it.
attacked: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo - not to my people!
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.
introduction: I am Mvemba a Nzinga and I greet you as a friend. I can see you are blessed by God. Are you here to share your enlightenment?
tradeRequest: My trade delegation should be arriving soon!
uniques: [+2 Food, +2 Production, +4 Gold] from all [Culture] buildings

name: Macedon
declaringWar: The armies of Greece await you with open arms!
attacked: Peace was never of all that much interest to me anyway.
defeated: Just as quickly as it began, my long march finally comes to end.
introduction: Greetings! I am Alexander of Macedon, the King and the Pharaoh, the undefeated General of Greece! Surely you've heard of me?
hateHello: I've dealt with traitors and deserters alike that were still more honorable than you!
tradeRequest: I've dispatched a trade delegation bearing gifts! I trust you'll greet my envoys warmly?
uniqueText: sorry, but now no uniques. idk how to release it(

name: Mali
declaringWar: Your transgressions are as deep as oceans. O God, grant that I may chastise this one!
attacked: Enough! My forbearance ends here! We must have war between us, instead of a false peace.
defeated: Wealth is fleeting; learning is vanity. All I have done, O God, I did in your name.
introduction: I am Sultan Musa, lord of Mali, and—thanks be to God—a very, very rich man. I am pleased to meet you.
tradeRequest: Please accept these simple gifts of one hundred porters carrying sacks of gold dust.
uniqueText: -30% Production when constructing Buildings and Military Units in all cities, +1 Food, +1 Culture, +1 Gold from every Desert, -1 Production, +4 Gold from every Mine
uniques: +[-30]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]

name: The Maori
declaringWar: You choose death! Your people wail and moan! The pillars of your houses shake, all your lands are shaking!
attacked: Look at the big civ leader over there with the war declaration! Great job, mate. Really shows off how hard you are.
defeated: I have done my utmost, but your strength was greater. My heart, at least, will beat undefeated.
introduction: I am Kupe the navigator, and you approach the place of the Maori. Will you tell me about yourself?
tradeRequest: Here are gifts of pounamu, korowai cloaks and huhu grubs.
uniqueText: Starts with Sailing and Shipbuilding unlocked and the ability to enter Ocean tiles. Embarked units can defend themselves. Unimproved Woods and Rainforests grant +2 Production. +1 Food from Fishing Boats. Great Artists cannot be earned.
uniques: Can embark and move over Coasts and Oceans immediately

name: The Mapuche
declaringWar: It comes to war. Mapuche shall use your own weapons against you!
attacked: I knew you could not be trusted! We have long prepared for this war. Have you?
defeated: We resisted to the last, but it was too late … too late.
introduction: I am Lautaro, the Swift Hawk. Mapuche honor me with respect. Will I see the same from you?
tradeRequest: Mapuche send gifts. Please accept these.
uniques: [Military] units gain [50]% more Experience from combat
+10% Strength for all units during Golden Age

name: Nubia
declaringWar: We have arrows, finely honed. We shall deliver them freely to your throat.
attacked: As predicted, you know only how to take. Come, then—choose the manner of your defeat.
defeated: Though Nubia declines, our pyramids shall remain long after your plans fall to ruin.
introduction: I am Amanitore of Nubia. All are welcome in our magnificent cities—provided they come as friends.
hateHello: With you, I always expect the worst.
tradeRequest: Our delegation brings goodwill!
uniqueText: Ranged units gain +50% combat experience, +50% Production when constructing Ranged units in all cities, +1 Production, +2 Gold from every Strategic resource
uniques: +[50]% Production when constructing [Ranged] units [in all cities]

name: Phoenicia
declaringWar: Now we have war between us. Look to the seas——already the horizon is crowded with the sails of my fleets.
attacked: War? Are you a fool? Your cities will suffer the fate of Epirus and Saguntum.
defeated: Do not glory in your conquest. One day you may see your capital bathed in flame.
introduction: I, Dido, queen and mother of Carthage, greet you on behalf of the Phoenicians.
tradeRequest: Accept these gifts—a mere taste of the wealth of Phoenicia.
uniques: Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark

name: Scotland
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Scotland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Scotland. Can you it hear?
introduction: I am Robert the Bruce. Scotland follows me—be it through fields of wheat or of battle.
tradeRequest: Please accept my people's finest gifts. Oh, and hark to the pipers! Are they not grand?

name: Scythia
declaringWar: The Empress calls for your head. You will be drowned in your own blood!
attacked: You have betrayed the trust of Tomyris and now you will pay!
defeated: The Empress falls, but I will be remembered. Will you?
introduction: Let it be known between us: I will repay treachery with blood! But, if you are a true friend, we will have peace.
hateHello: No one will believe your hollow lies.
tradeRequest: I have sent you a trade delegation bearing a decorated gorytos as a gift for you. You do have a bow, yes?
uniques: +[100]% production when constructing [Mounted] units [in all cities]

name: Sumeria
declaringWar: Why do I fight? Because I can... because Inanna demands it. Now you will know the power of Sumer!
attacked: I will enjoy hearing your last breath when you witness the destruction of your people.
defeated: What treachery did this to me? No, what evil?
introduction: I am Gilgamesh of Sumeria and King of Uruk. Do not be afraid… I am good to my friends.
neutralHello: All the world knows of my generosity to my friends.
tradeRequest: The delegation of Gilgamesh brings you Sumerian gifts. Will you accept them into your city?
uniques: Receive triple Gold from Barbarian encampments and pillaging Cities
City-State Influence degrades at half rate
